abstract: MasterCard SpendingPulse said a drop-off in consumer spending had sent its specialty retail sales index plunging 7.7 percent in September compared with last year.
snippet: MasterCard SpendingPulse said a drop-off in consumer spending had sent its specialty retail sales index plunging 7.7 percent in September compared with last year.
lead_paragraph: The back-to-school shopping season is about to receive a dismal report card.

headline.print_headline: Measure of Retail Sales Shows a Steep Decline in September
